metadata.name: Luminous Landscapes: 40.423, -86.921
metadata.description:
Location: 40.423, -86.921
Duration: 6 hours
Distance: 41 km (26 miles)

Realtime luminous intensity (lux) readings coupled with GPS data collected on personal walks across familiar and unfamiliar environments. Data is then mapped and manifested into alien or abstract landscapes taking viewers on a metaphysical journey that visualizes the intangible elements of space and the natural or urban environment.

2048x2048
24 sec video
